week trial in which he was convicted of the 2005 murder of Los Angeles County Sheriff 's Deputy Jerry Ortiz
Los Angeles County Sheriff 's Deputy Jerry Ortiz
Jeremy Ortiz , one of the deputy 's sons from a previous marriage
A rare exception for the 29 - year - old Hawaiian Gardens gang member
an occasional smile for his mother when he turned in his chair to glance back at her from time to time
the 29 - year - old Hawaiian Gardens gang member
him last month of the deputy 's slaying , as well as the attempted murder of another man just a few days prior to the ambush killing of Ortiz
him last month of the deputy 's slaying
time , who are willing to take on a stressful job
several members of the slain lawman 's family
the constant support from Anger , Stirling and the District Attorney 's office
the message sent by the jury 's sentence - that killing a police officer and flaunting all respect for authority and for life will not be tolerated -
Chela Ortiz - who was married three weeks before her husband was murdered -
friends that made the tumultuous trial more bearable , Chela and her in
kind of reliving the nightmare all over
two nearly killed when they were shot and stabbed in the back by Orozco , according to prosecutors
almost the same amount of time used to come to the guilty verdict on March 20
three jurors who spoke briefly outside the courtroom
a difficult one made slightly easier by the thorough job of the prosecutors and investigators
a friend and former gang member in Florida
A taped conversation between Orozco and two friends - one a fellow gang member and the other an associate - in a holding cell at the Bellflower Courthouse
Orozco and two friends - one a fellow gang member and the other an associate -
a hit on the two little girls and their mother - the star witnesses in the case
appointed defense attorneys assigned to Orozco
his mother to have to take the witness stand , a decision that likely destroyed his chance at any mercy on the part of the jury
a decision that likely destroyed his chance at any mercy on the part of the jury
a tactical decision reached by the two veteran attorneys , both with extensive experience with death penalty cases , and after consultation with their peers
